projectDetails.challenges: Building an interactive gallery with Fancybox and optimizing performance
projectDetails.solutions: Implemented Fancybox with optimized lazy loading and code splitting
projectDetails.learnings: Learned advanced React patterns and modern CSS techniques

projectTexts.heroParagraph: I created this website with great dedication, focusing on modern web development practices and user experience design.
projectTexts.description: This website is a showcase of my passion for web development and design. It features an interactive gallery, smooth animations, and responsive design. projectDetails.challenges: Implementing complex e-commerce features and payment integration
projectDetails.solutions: Used Stripe API for payments and implemented advanced state management
projectDetails.learnings: Gained expertise in full-stack development and payment systems

projectTexts.heroParagraph: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with modern technologies and best practices.
projectTexts.description: This e-commerce platform showcases advanced full-stack development skills. Features include user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and secure payment processing. The application is built with performance and scalability in mind, utilizing modern development practices and tools.

projectDetails.challenges: Creating intuitive user flows for complex mobile interactions
projectDetails.solutions: Conducted user research and iterative testing to optimize UX
projectDetails.learnings: Mastered mobile design patterns and user psychology

projectTexts.heroParagraph: A comprehensive mobile app design focusing on user experience and modern interface patterns.
projectTexts.description: This mobile app design project encompasses complete UI/UX design for a social networking application. The design features modern interface elements, intuitive navigation, and accessibility considerations. The project includes wireframes, high-fidelity mockups, interactive prototypes, and a complete design system.

projectDetails.challenges: Creating smooth animations while maintaining performance
projectDetails.solutions: Implemented efficient animation libraries and optimized loading
projectDetails.learnings: Advanced animation techniques and performance optimization

projectTexts.heroParagraph: A modern portfolio website showcasing creative web development and design skills.
projectTexts.description: This portfolio website represents the culmination of modern web development techniques. It features smooth animations, responsive design, and interactive elements. The site is built with performance in mind, utilizing code splitting, lazy loading, and optimized assets to ensure fast loading times across all devices.
